Dr. Woods Castile Soap is very mild and versatile for everyday as a body wash, facial cleanser, shampoo, and shaving lather. It is also excellent as a mild laundry detergent.

Originating from Castile, Spain, our soaps are vegetable based, containing no animal fat. Because our soaps are biodegradable, they are perfect for camping.

Castile Soap incorporates the natural healing properties of olive oil with an invigorating scent. The olive oil in our soaps attracts moisture and, while holding the moisture close to the skin, forms a breathable layer preventing the loss of that moisture.


Dr.Woods Castile Soap does not contain any harsh detergents that can strip away skin's natural moisture. The fragrance refreshes and reinvigorates your skin and senses after a long, hectic day, while the Vitamin E rich lather leaves skin feeling naturally clean and dewy soft. Use this rich lathering liquid soap to gently cleanse hands and your entire body.

B004KEJ65C: Folicure Extra Shampoo can be an excellent hair care choice for anyone dealing with hair loss or thinning locks. This product can help to promote follicular health and can restore your hair to its original beauty. When used properly, it can make your tresses look and feel thicker and fuller. If you want to show off a head of hair that will attract compliments, this product may produce the full, thick results you desire. Folicure shampoo features a special formula designed to care for your head. The special Swiss conditioner Pantethine can help to keep your locks soft and flexible while jojoba oil can protect and nourish your tresses and promote hair growth. Phytantriol can help to add body and bulk to your hair while jaborandi can revitalize the look of your style by improving volume. It contains natural herbs like rosemary and basil to stimulate hair growth and improve the texture and feel of your hair. The full ingredients list of this shampoo is as follows: Water, Sodium Laurreth Sulfate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Panthenol,Sodium PCA, Pantethine Panthenyl Ethyl Ether, Phytantriol, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Hydrolyzed Yeast, Soy Protein, Jojoba Oil, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans (Hydrolyzed Mucopolysaccharides), Nettle, Jaborandi, Rosemary, Basil, Comfrey, Parsley, Methylparaben, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, FD&C Yellow #5, FD&C Red #4, and FD&C Blue #1.Folicure Extra Shampoo can help to repair your hair after it has been chemically colored, permed, or treated. It can also help to restore health to damaged locks for a beautiful look. With its moisturizing ingredients, it can nourish the strands of your hair for a soft, smooth finish. As this shampoo helps to fix brittle locks, your hairstyle can become fuller and have more luster and shine. If your hair has been damaged or over-processed, Folicure Shampoo can be the right choice to restore the beauty you desire. Whether you use heated styling tools or your locks are just getting thinner due to age, Folicure shampoo can help to provide care for your tresses. This product contains light oils that can help to add volume to your hairstyle without weighing your strands down. It can clean your hair as well without taking out or stripping nutrients needed to keep your locks healthy and beautiful. If you have always dreamed of having a naturally thick and bouncy hairstyle, this product can be a great choice to add to your shower routine.Folicure moisturizing shampoos can help to transform brittle, fine strands into full, thick tresses for a luxurious look. It can nourish and soften while providing cleansing treatment for a lovely, eye catching hairstyle. After regular use, you can find that the product will plump the strands of your locks with natural herbs for added volume and shine. This product can be a nice choice for men and women, and it can work great on oily, dry, or normal hair types. If you are concerned about hair loss or thinning, damaged, or dry hair, you can try washing with Folicure Extra. It could provide a hair care solution that improves your look and feel on a daily basis. This product comes in a bottle of 12 fluid ounces.
B007V6JNE0:
Size: 3.5ml / .118 oz

This advanced RevitaLash formula contains a proprietary blend of proven functional cosmetic ingredients pioneered by Athena, combined with an infusion of powerful peptides and soothing botanicals, designed to both beautify and nourish the eyelashes.

Revitalash enhances lashes and protects against breakage while improving flexibility & shine for more dramatic lashes.

BENEFITS:
Curl Effect helps naturally lift and curl the eyelashes.
Proprietary blend of scientifically-advanced technology and natural botanicals join in concert to protect against breakage and brittleness. Improve flexibility, moisture, and shine for more dramatic-looking eyelashes.
Daily use provides immediate conditioning benefits, leading to healthier-looking, more luxurious lashes.

APPLICATION:
CLEANSE: Remove makeup and residue. Keep in mind, oil-based makeup removers and cleansers can leave behind a film which may create a barrier between your lashes and the lash conditioner. It’s important to wash off any residue.
APPLY: Apply a thin line of RevitaLash Advanced in a swiping motion to the top-side of your lashes.The conditioner is specially formulated to stay where you apply it. A little goes a long way! Allow lashes to dry before proceeding with skin care and makeup routines.
USE DAILY: RevitaLash Advanced works best when used consistently. Apply daily for best results.

KEY INGREDIENTS:
Biopeptin Complex: Proprietary Blend Of Biotin, Green Tea Extract (Rich In Panthenol), Peptides, And Lipids. Helps Condition And Strengthen Lashes While Defending From Breakage And Brittleness.
Ginseng & Swertia Japonica: Plant Extracts High In Anti-oxidants And Vitamin B. Helps Protect And Revitalize.
Saw Palmetto: High In Fatty Acids And Plant Sterols. Helps Condition And Shine.
Wheat Protein: High In Amino Acids, Peptides, And B Vitamins. Helps Fortify, Smooth, And Condition.
